summary: Preset for an oriental looking character, for the YgNord race from ECE
descriptionHtml:
Kidara- Oriental beauty Preset
Version:1
Date: 28/6/2014
Category: Saves and Presets
Author(s): cchoay AKA Midnight Falcon
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7270

Please do endorse this mod if you enjoy it. Helps to encourage me =)


Details
=======
A preset for ECE, featuring an oriental beauty (or at least I like to think that she is)

She belongs to the YgNord race that is available in Enhanced Character Edit.

The additional meshes and textures are included so that users only have to replace the default meshes and textures in the YgNord in order to look like the screenshot

Her preset slot is slot 8

Troubleshooting
================
If it ever appears like the eyes are misaligned/looking wonky, try moving the slider for 'Forehead down' until the eyes are aligned and the face looks normal.

Requirements
============
Enhanced Character Edit
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D12951%26preview%3D&pUp=1

Mods used in the screenshot
============================
Neos' Oriental Dress by Nausicaa
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14642/?
Ponytail Hairstyles by Azar
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/?
Envision Face by DD AKT
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7897/?
RANs Headmesh Variants by RAN46 (type D)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?
Caliente's Beautiful Bodes Editition-CBBE- by Caliente
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D2666&pUp=1


Installation
=============
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)SkyrimData
4. Place the _8_commonTriRaces.slot file in (whatever directory)skyrimCME_Save
5. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).


History
=======
1.0, 2014/06/28 - Initial release.
